1.name: The General
1.description: When Union spies steal an engineer's beloved locomotive, he pursues it single-handedly and straight through enemy lines.

2.description: The demon Mephisto wagers with God that he can corrupt a mortal man's soul.

4.description: A man takes a job at an asylum with hopes of freeing his imprisoned wife.

5.name: Die Abenteuer des Prinzen Achmed
5.description: A handsome prince rides a flying horse to faraway lands and embarks on magical adventures, which include befriending a witch, meeting Aladdin, battling demons and falling in love with a princess.

6.description: After having a child out of wedlock, a young Puritan woman is pressured to reveal the name of her lover.

11.description: While building an irrigation system for a Southwestern desert community, an engineer vies with a local cowboy for the affections of a rancher's daughter.

12.description: Three outlaws come to the aid of a young girl after her father is killed.

14.description: In 16th Century Italy, devil-may-care playboy Don Juan runs afoul of the despotic Borgias.

15.description: A group of starving artists try to survive in 1830s Paris, including a seamstress and the would-be playwright she loves.

16.description: Childhood friends are torn apart when one of them marries the woman the other once fiercely loved.

37.description: Two thieves, the Blackbird and West End Bertie, fall in love with the same girl, a French nightclub performer named Fifi. Each man tries to outdo the other to win her heart.

41.name: Nana
